Limmerik for Joker
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Poetry: Limmerik for Joker
By Tigerbubble on Thursday, February 28, 2002 - 01:48 pm:

Magi the white coated Joker.
His exploits are more that just poker.
He's now in the slammer.
For he stole Pancho's hammer.
Its said his cellmate's Al Roker.

Did i spell Al Roker's name right? if i didn't i'll just revise it. I couldn't think of anything else that rhymed with poker or joker.

By Petit-Trot on Friday, March 1, 2002 - 08:06 am:

I like it.

By Lisa Shock on Friday, March 1, 2002 - 01:04 pm:

broker, choker, croaker, ocher, smoker, soaker, stoker, toker....

By Tigerbubble on Friday, March 1, 2002 - 06:43 pm:

thanks lisa, hears a revised version.

Magi the sly, well-dressed Joker.
His exploits are more than just poker.
He is now in the slammer.
For he stole Pancho's hammer.
Now all he can afford is a choker.

I'm not very satified with the last line, but on the up side, i might be humorous to see a Magi with nother bu a choker on, it would pretty much a mask and a choker.

Was the first version ok Lisa, because i kind of prefer it more than my second version?

By Petit-Trot on Friday, March 1, 2002 - 07:33 pm:

Al always brightens my days. The first is better.

By torey_luvullo on Friday, March 1, 2002 - 08:16 pm:

ya, i agree with pt - any limerick with al roker as the punchline makes me laugh.

By Tigerbubble on Saturday, March 2, 2002 - 01:21 pm:

Ok here is another revision

Magi the sly, well-dressed Joker.
His exploits are more than just poker.
He is now in the slammer.
For he stole pancho's hammer.
So happerns the jail gaurd's Al Roker.


Imagine that one. Al Roker the prison gaurd vs. Magi the Joker with a big toy hammer.
Haha, that brings up a very odd notion, imagine if in monster rancher some of the hidden monsters were celeberities that you can train and fight.
